name: Shelf-Help
description:
------------------------------- Shelf-Help --------------------------------

You're trapped in a room with incoming zombies where the only things left are bottles stored on the shelves and crates! "Help yourshelf" by throwing bottles from the shelf to the oncoming zombies! ;) 

To aim, point the cursor towards the target and click the left mouse button to fire! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Details

Shelf-Help was made in 3 hours using the Unity engine for TriJam #172! It had been a while since I had done a game jam and especially one so time pressured so I'm glad I managed to complete it. :) 

I realised after publishing the game that I prefer the title "Help Yourshelf" but I wanted to be done so bad I couldn't help myshelf.

The key to getting the game done in time was to have my previous games and asset links up on the screen to use as quick references. For next time I'd like to think more about gameplay rather than trying to use assets to make the game seem prettier haha.  

Art and sound assets used were obtained from the itch asset store. 

Thanks for playing my game, hope to see you soon. :)
